Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
THE FLORIDA STATE UNIVERSITY
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
File Ref: Legis
Thank you for letting me hear from you.
I appreciated your taking the time and effort to
let me have the benefit of your thinking regarding H. R.
6736, the Public Television Act of 1967, and other related
bills. I note your support for the full inclusion of radio
in all titles of the proposed bill.
Your views are most helpful to me and you may be
assured that I will keep them in mind.
Kind regards and best wishes.
Sincerely your^
